Monterey_Park.Marc and Eva Stern Math and Science Scho: The Marc and Eva Stern Math and Science School, also known as The Stern Math and Science School or Stern MASS, is a charter high school in the University Hills neighborhood in the City of Los Angeles. It is a collaboration between the Alliance for College-Ready Public Schools and California State University, Los Angeles (CSULA). The charter was granted by the Los Angeles Unified School District in 2006.
